shortDescription: A command injection vulnerability exists in /goform/exeCommand in Tenda AC18 v15.03.05.05, which allows attackers to construct cmdinput parameters for arbitrary command execution.
vulnerabilityName: Tenda AC18 V15.03.05.05 Firmware formexeCommand Function Command Injection
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
